The Bulacan State University strives to maintain an educational environment that supports the academic, professional, and personal development of all members of the community, where relationships among students, faculty, and staff are marked by mutual respect and appreciation for each other's rights and responsibilities.
The University recognizes the rights of its students guaranteed by the Constitution of the Philippines and the Education Act of 1982.
